permissions: Delete permission is delegated to the related project_customer and ultimately the project; allowed for users who can update the project under ProjectPolicy (admins or users who are practically managers of the project developer).
side_effects: Deletes a project cost code record.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument. Requires --confirm and it must be true; command errors if omitted or false.

flags.name: --confirm
flags.validation: Must be true; command errors if omitted or false.
